full_description:
Walton 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-RIVERINE-12F)

The Walton 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-RIVERINE-12F) is a smart cooling option to improve interior comfort. This AC is perfect for places up to one ton in size because of its sophisticated inverter technology, which efficiently delivers cooling with a cooling capability of 12000 BTU/hr or 3517 Watts. Its tremendous performance and environmentally sustainable R-32 refrigerant is powered by a rotary inverter compressor. It uses 1120 watts of electricity when operating at a rated voltage of 230V and a frequency of 50Hz, and its energy efficiency ratio (EER) is 3.14 for economical running. To meet a variety of cooling needs, the air conditioner has numerous modes, such as Turbo Mode for quick cooling, ECO Mode for energy savings, and Dry Mode for dehumidification. With its louvered fin evaporator and condenser coils, the Walton 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-RIVERINE-12F) optimizes heat exchange efficiency while guaranteeing durability. With a broad operating temperature range of 20˚C to 52˚C, the AC is appropriate for various climates. You may personalize your cooling experience by adjusting the speed settings, auto swing, timer, and sleep mode. In addition to features like auto restart, kid lock, and temperature unit adjustment, the LCD and IR remote control offer intuitive operation. For your home or workplace, the Walton 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-RIVERINE-12F) provides dependable and adaptable cooling thanks to its cutting-edge features and effective operation.

Walton 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-INVERNA SUPERSAVER-18H PLASMA)

The Walton 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-INVERNA SUPERSAVER-18H PLASMA) is designed for spaces up to 1.5 tons in size. It uses only 1240 watts of electricity when operating at a rated voltage of 230V and a frequency of 50Hz, and it has an excellent energy efficiency ratio (EER) of 4.25 for economical running. To meet a variety of cooling needs, the Walton 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-INVERNA SUPERSAVER-18H PLASMA) has three flexible cooling modes: Turbo Mode for rapid cooling, ECO Mode for energy conservation, and Dry Mode for dehumidification. It optimizes heat exchange efficiency and durability with a micro-channel condenser with wave fins and a louvered fin evaporator. Other features of the Walton 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-INVERNA SUPERSAVER-18H PLASMA) include mold-proofing for better air quality, frost clean for easy maintenance, kids mode for increased safety, and air plasma for cleaner air. Convenient operation is guaranteed by the hidden LED display and IR remote control, and user convenience is increased by functions like auto restart, kid lock, and temperature unit changing. Personalized cooling experiences are provided by the Walton 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type WSI-INVERNA SUPERSAVER-18H PLASMA), which has adjustable speed settings, a timer, and sleep mode. full_description:
Walton 3 Ton Cassette AC (WCN-HEXACOMB-36G)

The Walton 3 Ton Cassette AC (WCN-HEXACOMB-36G) is a powerful cooling solution suitable for commercial and big domestic applications, with a cooling capability of 36000 BTU/hr or 10550 Watts. It guarantees effective cooling performance using an R-410a refrigerant and a Rotary Fixed Speed compressor. Suitable for a variety of climates, the Walton 3 Ton Cassette AC (WCN-HEXACOMB-36G) operates within an ambient temperature range of 18˚C to 43˚C. It does not have Turbo Mode or Eco Mode, but it makes up for it with flexible features like Auto Operation, Dry Mode, and several fan speeds for individual comfort. The addition of Sleep Mode, Timer, and Auto Restart improves both practicality and energy economy. Long-term dependability is ensured by the sturdy design of the Walton 3 Ton Cassette AC (WCN-HEXACOMB-36G), which includes a Copper Tube Condenser with split fin interior and outdoor fins. It provides versatility in installation, with a maximum pipe length of 30 meters. Operation is simple with the backlit LCD and simple controls. In addition, the AC has an Auto UP-Down Swing for better air dispersion and the ability to convert temperature units from Celsius to Fahrenheit. This Walton cassette air conditioner offers complete cooling capability for huge areas, even without a child lock.
